aboutme.title: About me
aboutme.description: My name is Marcos Javier Gomez, I am 23 years old and I am currently an advanced student of the Computer Engineering career at the National University of Catamarca and I work as a QA Analyst at IncluIT.
aboutme.description2: I started in the world of web development two years ago and since then I have not stopped. I am passionate about computing, technology and coffee. My favorite topics are space exploration, the crypto world and programming.
aboutme.description3: I am quite self-taught, I constantly seek to learn new things, find solutions and solve problems.
aboutme.description4: I hope I can grow professionally, and in some way contribute to society.
aboutme.contactCity: San Fernando del Valle de Catamarca, Catamarca, 4700
